title: Open a Commercial Line of Credit
description: A corporate client needs to open a line of credit to manage working capital.

tasks.description: Gather the company's financial statements and application details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all required documentation for underwriting.

tasks.description: Perform credit analysis and underwriting on the company.
tasks.expected_outcome: The credit risk department analyzes the company's financials and approves a credit line.

tasks.description: Generate loan documents and open the line of credit for the approved amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the legal agreements and officially opens the credit facility.
